Docs.summary: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates. This class cannot be inherited.

Docs.param: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
The title of the dialog box.
A descriptive message to guide the user. The message is displayed in the dialog box.
One of the values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.
Docs.summary: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.
Docs.exception: The parameter is not a valid flag.
